sentences.english: Video recording or reproducing apparatus, whether or not incorporating a video tuner.
sentences.chinese: 視頻信號錄製或重放設備，不論是否裝有高頻調諧器。

sentences.english: The speech itself was filmed at Southwark Cathedral in London.
sentences.chinese: 女王今年的聖誕演講是在倫敦的南沃克大教堂錄製的。

sentences.english: He recorded the song from an old record album.
sentences.chinese: 他錄製了來自老唱片集的歌。

sentences.english: When you are recording video, it will use the secondary mic for the sound.
sentences.chinese: 當你在錄製視頻時，他會使用第二個麥克風錄音。

sentences.english: Here is a recording from "The Philadelphia Story."
sentences.chinese: 這裏是從錄製的“費城故事”。

sentences.english: We didn't record lesson 78 yesterday evening.
sentences.chinese: 昨天晚上，我們沒有錄製第78課的語音文件。

sentences.english: Smart TV mobile phone, analog TV, can record TV shows.
sentences.chinese: 智能TV手機，模擬電視，可錄製電視節目。

sentences.english: During her lifetime, the songstress had recorded over 100 albums.
sentences.chinese: 在她的一生中，錄製了超過100部專輯。

sentences.english: Can you play (me) his latest record?
sentences.chinese: 你能給我放放他最新錄製的唱片嗎？

sentences.english: Utility to record and play sounds by using a sound card .
sentences.chinese: 使用音效卡錄製並播放聲音的實用程式。

sentences.english: Why not make an intimate, confessional documentary?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不錄製一個私人的懺悔紀錄片呢？

sentences.english: Practice your presentation; role-play and video tape yourself if possible.
sentences.chinese: 演練演講，角色扮演，如果有可能的話可以錄製下來。

sentences.english: Unable to open the selected audio device for recording.
sentences.chinese: 無法打開選定的音頻設備進行錄製。

sentences.english: Yes, it will be recorded and edited.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我將會錄製下來並編輯。

sentences.english: This recording of the Mozart violin concertos is quite simply the best available.
sentences.chinese: 這是莫扎特的小提琴協奏曲錄製簡直可以說是最好的。

sentences.english: At 25, I recorded my first album.
sentences.chinese: 25歲，我錄製了自己的第一張個人專輯。

definition: album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
cast and crew/performers and production team
broadcast/CL:個|个[ge4]/broadcasting/to broadcast/(formal) to propagate/to publicize
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
